reviews.review: One of the best game I have ever played. Filled with humor, excellent level design, well written characters, over all an astounding game. A game I consider flawless.

Могу посоветовать игру любителям головоломок , неплохо реализован кооп . Интересный сюжет поворот с предательствами и даже есть пасхалки , которые к слову мне не удалось найти . Тут ты можешь пройти уровень на абум , почти не думая , а можешь застрять на одном минут на 20-30. Иногда игра становится занудной и скучной .ставлю 8 порталов из 10.

★★★★★

A longer, incredible sequel to one of my favorite games of all time. This one focuses a lot more on the story aspect of the series and is such a fun experience. Really hope i get to see another Portal game one day...
I have not played this game till 2020 because of quarintine and it is pretty good

Depois de 11 horas de jogo, preso em alguns puzzles, e muita risada, e eu chorando no final, aqui vai minha review (Sem spoilers): 

Portal 2 é simplesmente o melhor jogo de puzzle que eu já joguei na minha vida, personagens carismáticos, puzzles complexos e divertidos, história sensacional; e não é só na área de design que Portal 2 arrasa, na área técnica também, á engine de física desse jogo é uma das melhores que já vi, meus parabéns a todos os envolvidos em trazer essa obra-de-arte para o mundo, Portal 2 é um jogo que sem dúvidas vai me marcar pra sempre.
portal is a really fun puzzle game.

if you like puzzles, and you like first person shooters, then this is DEFINITELY the game for you. Thought-out puzzles, beautifuul and scary underground landscapes, and an absolutely ridiculous sense of humor. this is a great game!

Beaten base game [12.25.2020], Coop not beaten yet

Portal 2 is the sequel game to Portal which was a fun game on its own. This game adds more to what I loved in the first game with more. The visuals & gameplay looks and plays better than the first. Similar to the first I do see myself playing this game again in the future. The multiplayer is fun too is you have someone who is willing to play with you! (Still need to finish the multiplayer)

This is a game I've delayed playing for far too long. I loved the first part, and the second part is nothing short of awesome. The humor is great, the characters are lovely and the gameplay is very fun. Highly recommended!

I can see why people want a Portal 3, but I can also see why people don't.
This was a great ending to the tragically short series. Never knew I could be so impressed with an entire company in 10 hours (Portal 1 & 2)

And the soundtrack? For a 2011 game? 
In conclusion, this is one of my top 3 favourite games of all time. Can't wait for valve to release something else like this.
Лучшая игра(после майнкрафта конечно). Советую поиграть в нее, на распродажах можно урвать за ~30 рублей. Это того стоит
Really makes a person think outside the box

เป็นเกมส์ที่ยอดเยี่ยมมากโดยเฉพาะการเล่นเป็นทีม ไม่เคยมีเกมส์ไหนที่ซื้อมาแล้วรู้สึกคุ้มขนาดนี้ สามารถเล่นได้ทั้งแบบเดี่ยว และคู่ด้วยรูปแบบปริศนาที่แตกต่างกัน ภาพของเกมส์ มุมมองต่างๆสุดยอดมาก เล่นตอนปี 2020 ก็ไม่ได้ดูเก่าเลย ปริศนายากมากพอที่จะทำให้เราสนุกกับการขบคิดทางแก้ปัญหาร่วมกับเพื่อน และประทับใจในความฉลาดของตัวเองเมื่อผ่านเลเวลต่างๆ ให้ทั้งเสียงหัวเราะ และความตื่นเต้นในขณะที่คิดแก้ปริศนาจนหัวแตกไปพร้อมๆกัน เกมส์นี้จะเป็นเกมส์เรารอคอยภาคต่อตลอดไป สุดยอดมากๆ
